mapper.sql: tv_season.id, tv_season.name, tv_season.season_number, tv_season.description, tv_season.tv_series_id, tv_season.start_date, tv_season.end_date, tomatometer_info_tv.tomatometer AS value, CASE WHEN tomatometer_info_tv.certified_fresh THEN 'certified_fresh' WHEN tomatometer_info_tv.num_reviews < 5 THEN 'NA' WHEN tomatometer_info_tv.tomatometer IS NULL THEN 'NA' WHEN (tomatometer_info_tv.tomatometer >= 60) THEN 'fresh' ELSE 'rotten' END AS state, vanity_tv_series_url.url AS series_url FROM tv_season LEFT JOIN tomatometer_info_tv ON tv_season.id = tomatometer_info_tv.media_id AND tomatometer_info_tv.media_type='SE' LEFT JOIN vanity_tv_series_url ON vanity_tv_series_url.tv_series_id = tv_season.tv_series_id
